title: Aldea Yanapay
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Latin American, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant on the second floor with a nostalgic ambiance. Multiple vegan menu items, including some dishes in the daily changing buffet. A part of the economic self-sustainability concept that works with families and kids in Cusco, so 100% of the benefit goes to the project. Vegetarian buffet daily 12-3pm.
